channel.title: Can Some one give me a link to some Port Fowarding TUTS?
channel.description: Please I need help. Cause i'm a noob. :|

item.title: Can Some one give me a link to some Port Fowarding TUTS?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well if you go into server.java and search for this:

43594

you will see somthing like this:

public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594;

You can change the “43594” to whichever port you wish. Then you need to chnage the rule in your router (or port on Hamachi) to that new one. I still do not know hot to chnage a client (like moparscape) to a different port SORRY! But I hoped this helped somewhat!

Read full topic
item.source: Can Some one give me a link to some Port Fowarding TUTS?
